Articles.Content:
> 
> I counter with a banhammer.
> 
> -snip-
> 
> It happens to people that stray off-topic and start rambling about their fanboyism.

Wait... A hammer defeats a Black Hole?

![Bottled-water.jpg](http://toxicfreekidsblog.org/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/Bottled-water.jpg)

> 
> I counter with a banhammer.
> 
> ![BanHammer.gif](http://krapps.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/11/BanHammer.gif)
> 
> It happens to people that stray off-topic and start rambling about their fanboyism.

Please forgive me.
Anyway, I spill your puny water.

![stockphotopro_31791qtx_water_spill.JPG](http://www.stockphotopro.com/photo-thumbs-2/stockphotopro_31791qtx_water_spill.JPG)

I send the spilled water to the warp.

> ![Space_Warp_Portal_Effect_by_Qzma.jpg](http://www.deviantart.com/download/26520110/Space_Warp_Portal_Effect_by_Qzma.jpg)

I save everyone form it...

![images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ07LAex8-Z-FF2PFkp0_UmhfA6b3H2JOyDqR_oegY4Z7uPkFfC0w](https://encrypted-tbn1.google.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ07LAex8-Z-FF2PFkp0_UmhfA6b3H2JOyDqR_oegY4Z7uPkFfC0w)

> 
> I save everyone form it...

![the%20day%20after%20tomorrow-1.jpg](http://www.cheapdvdsale.com/image/data/12.2/the%20day%20after%20tomorrow-1.jpg)

> ![atlantis%20shield.jpg](http://orbitalvector.com/Defenses/Force%20Fields/atlantis%20shield.jpg)

Yep.

![Voyager_aftphasers.jpg](http://images.wikia.com/memoryalpha/en/images/b/b0/Voyager_aftphasers.jpg)

Phaser.

> ![mirror_by_Harp-02.jpg](http://plataformadesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/mirror_by_Harp-02.jpg)

I think we may need a bigger mirror.

> 
> > ![mirror_by_Harp-02.jpg](http://plataformadesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/mirror_by_Harp-02.jpg)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I think we may need a bigger mirror.

![mirrors-intl-poster-1.jpg](http://www.iwatchstuff.com/2008/08/06/mirrors-intl-poster-1.jpg)

and everyone dies by the mirror.

![c7d5371d54b4d80a69ce2d5f192e463f3604335e3337f3cfb851df5698843b126g.jpg](http://www./conv/c7d5371d54b4d80a69ce2d5f192e463f3604335e3337f3cfb851df5698843b126g.jpg)

break that mirror

Why stop there?

![images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS54Jvvcb-hs99a5eR6MrfjsyKgnVHBRpfNSAlsFrJEtjKol7WL](https://encrypted-tbn3.google.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS54Jvvcb-hs99a5eR6MrfjsyKgnVHBRpfNSAlsFrJEtjKol7WL)
![shield_2.jpg](http://allbetsareoff.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2009/05/shield_2.jpg)

Master Chiefs bubble shield is better than yours.

![6iwIb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6iwIb.jpg)

My planetary defense shield is bigger than yours.

![wy3Ob.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/wy3Ob.jpg)

Giant hammer succesfully deflected.

![QU20n.png](http://i.imgur.com/QU20n.png)

Your argument is invalid.

You can all die, I can bend math itself... ;P

![1-2-proof.jpg](http://mathtricks.org/wp-content/uploads/2010/01/1-2-proof.jpg)

That pic makes sense up until the equations start getting smaller again, at which point it is incorrect.

Also:

![MNAMD.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/MNAMD.jpg)

Once again, your argument is invalid.

Theres only way to defeat math....

**x/0**

![vdVrv.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/vdVrv.jpg)

Well, Me and my friends survive.

![space_ship.jpg](https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MmSWA6_GzTY/Tta98maDgiI/AAAAAAAAObA/s1QeiGMfbdM/s1600/space_ship.jpg)

I opened this in your ship.

![Uv4aH.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Uv4aH.jpg)

And then this happened:

![iP6Fh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/iP6Fh.jpg)

Your fireworks woke the neighbors... =P

![PDbWV.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PDbWV.jpg)

![tardis-tennant.jpg](http://www.justjon.net/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/tardis-tennant.jpg)

Please.
![wa_2128337.jpg](http://cdn.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1218/wa_2128337.jpg)

![circle.jpg](http://mormonmatters.org/wp-content/uploads/2010/01/circle.jpg)

The circle causes the Minecraft Universe to overload and collapse into itself and be permanently destroyed.

![index.php?action=dlattach;attach=16552;type=avatar](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;attach=16552;type=avatar)

You all die when Herobrine finally beats the circle and restores Minecraft, I don\'t because I can survive without anything that\'s round. HAHA. And I don\'t even like Minecraft much.
